entries.info: index of the track in the DC bank
entries.name: index

entries.info: status of the track (0: not refit using FMT, 1: refit using FMT)
entries.name: status

entries.info: sector of the track in DC
entries.name: sector

entries.info: Vertex x-position of the swam track to the DOCA to the beamline (in cm)
entries.name: Vtx0_x

entries.info: Vertex y-position of the swam track to the DOCA to the beamline (in cm)
entries.name: Vtx0_y

entries.info: Vertex z-position of the swam track to the DOCA to the beamline (in cm)
entries.name: Vtx0_z

entries.info: 3-momentum x-coordinate of the swam track to the DOCA to the beamline (in cm)
entries.name: p0_x

entries.info: 3-momentum y-coordinate of the swam track to the DOCA to the beamline (in cm)
entries.name: p0_y

entries.info: 3-momentum z-coordinate of the swam track to the DOCA to the beamline (in cm)
entries.name: p0_z

entries.info: number of degrees of freedom of the fit
entries.name: NDF
